Text: Only 5 tunes from the original Love you live album. HTW is Mick Jagger live, some are from Steel Wheels (SFTD, JJF, CAGWYW etc), Star from probally from78. Brown Sugar from 72-3. If you expect the real album don't download, otherwise have fun with it.
not a good recording...sound like a vynil record.

Yeah, this is garbage.  I wonder what causes people to put stuff like this up.  Don't get me wrong, I appreciate people putting together torrents for the rest of us, and I'm well aware that I didn't pay for this, but why even waste time seeding something like this?  Why patch together a bunch of low quality recordings from various sources and call it "Love You Live"?
